DOC.brief_summary: Pain treatment anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction - Comparison infiltration analgesia femoral nerve block .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Infiltration Analgesia With Femoral Nerve Block After Hamstrings Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria : - Patients undergoing primary anetrior cruciate ligament reconstruction semiTendinos/gracillis graft - Age > 18 year Exclusion Criteria : - Revision ACL reconstruction - Patients cartilige lision - Patients arthritis - Pregnant woman .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo primary anetrior cruciate ligament reconstruction semiTendinos/gracillis graft Age > 18 year Revision ACL reconstruction Patients cartilige lision Patients arthritis Pregnant woman .
